title: Poll "Whats your main?"
body:
I've been playing team builder alot and i've noticed that there are constantly changing numbers for how many of each role there is. So I would like to know what is your main? Vote below and comment why you chose it.


Edit: Wow, this is really interesting looking that the numbers. Thanks to everyone for voting.
Edit 2: WOAHHHHH, 800+ views?!?!?! 370+ votes!?!!?! WOW, Thanks for the contributation guys.  <3
Edit 3: 1.6k views and 682 votes...... I'm speechless. Awesome stuff guys!

replies.body: I main top lane because it's the manliest lane with the manliest players and the manliest champions. Champions like Nasus, Renekton, Darius, Garen, Riven, or Irelia.
Battle bunny Riven and Frostbooties Irelia are the manliest of them all.
Darius and Diana are in fact the manliest champions in league... because their E is designed to pull ALL five enemy champions to them for a manly 1v5 fight!
We all know {{champion:78}} is the manliest champ around. She's so manly that when she wants to kill someone, no-one dares to interfere.
But for real have you seen a 8 and 2 Poppy run into bot lane at full speed, then ult the support? Did you see the fear in your AD carries eyes?

As a Poppy main,
I agree.
teemo > all of those except riven.
No, leave this place. And never return. With your satan worshipping >:(
But Teemo I mean Satan is so fun to play. {{champion:17}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{champion:17}}
No, bad. Shoo, go back to your yordle home.
Top lane represent! People always praise the mid, ADC. or jungler for carrying. But would they be able to carry if the Top and Supports weren't peeling for their asses? I didn't think so.
As an ADC main I agree. We deny it but and say were carrying hard but we really need that peel to do any damage and not get instantly killed in half a second.

adc

because they put {{champion:82}} bot
Upvote for you, Down vote for the 5.16 patch :p

Ok look at all the support mains though??? Do you think this just means people like to pretend they main support, or that support mains are simply more vocal and frequent the boards more? Because I can't tell you the last time someone didn't pick support last
I actually have seen way more people request support here recently...maybe cause supports have been getting way more hype in the LCS recently.
Maybe in the future, people will actually say "SUPPORT OR FEED"

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=r7nG54Uz,comment-id=000d00000000,timestamp=2015-08-29T19:36:21.667+0000)
>
> Maybe in the future, people will actually say "SUPPORT OR FEED"

I've had  people in champ select say "not going to support" or "can't support" etc, then I say "no worries I main support" and you'd think I just said I was a flying octopus millionaire because it blows their minds.
You should see what I get when I say I main Bard.
Bard mains are truly terrifying...
We can only hope...

> [{quoted}](name=Aevo 55,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=r7nG54Uz,comment-id=000d000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-29T21:14:35.567+0000)
>
> We can only hope...

Why that? How would that be any better than MID OR FEED?

SUPPORT OR FEED
*locks In Annie
I honestly think that people who like to support are by nature more prone to like the game as an ensemble and be interested in the development, thus making them more present on the boards.
As a support main, and someone who is on the boards a lot and seen these types of polls before, I have come to the conclusion that this has to be true.

IMO, its because people who play support are people who really understand this game and have better in game knowledge.  And a lot of these players are on the boards

whereas ADC mains are the HURRDURR people of league, and I won't even start on the FotM players who have no main roles or champs, they just play whatever is hot in LC$

A lot of supports like Team builder because of how easy it is to get their role. You often lose it to bot duos in other playlists.

Also, they are so in damand that I can just keep jumping between lobbies to get the exact comp I want.
Agreed on the first part, but not the second. I'd only leave a party if people are trolling or picking dumb stuff like AP {{champion:80}} Mid.

Eh, I tend to lobby hop if the entire team is squish. Nami support and a whole load of squishies without even so much as a bruiser in sight? Yeah, I'm gonna lobby hop unless the entire comp is good at playing keep-away.
I'm a bush main. {{champion:86}}  {{champion:86}}  {{champion:86}}
i main support because i get worshipped when i do good
What universe do you live in?!??! Being a support main, its either do well and dont get noticed, or miss a hook and get flamed and blamed for losing lane

Playing support is like being a stunt double for a movie.

If you do well, nobody even notices you're there. Perform badly, and everyone will know.

Oh my god it all makes sense now. no one likes to play jungle or ADC so riot has been adding more stuff for jungle and nerfing Armor in an attempt to get those roles played more! 

http://i3.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/000/819/702/5be.gif
And they buffed AP items because there weren't enough mages!

I play top lane because I get to play my favorite champion {{champion:92}} 
<3
Riven is love, Riven is life <3
Except when the Riven claims to be Diamond 1 and is out played by a Bronze 5
not "Faker Wannabe", I'd say "Faker in-the-making"  ;)
{{champion:119}} won't support anyone who isn't {{champion:119}} because {{champion:119}} needs more glory.

> [{quoted}](name=SnipingwithStyle,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=r7nG54Uz,comment-id=002600000000,timestamp=2015-08-30T06:49:12.592+0000)
>
> {{champion:119}} won't support anyone who isn't {{champion:119}} because {{champion:119}} needs more glory.

This {{champion:119}} needs more {{champion:119}} if you ask me.

I'd rather sort them by preference than say I main a role.

Support > Jungle=ADC > Top > Mid
Jungle. nothing brings me more joy than showing up and ganking some overextended bro, being like "WASSUUUUUUUUUP" and proceeding to kill them. its fun showin up out of the blue.
I main support, but I make sure I can play a minimum of 2 champions in every role.
More people main support than people who main adc? Then why is there always a shortage of supps in games ._.
Support, second most mained role? Bullsh*t. Just try playing teambuilder.
Fill?
